00186 /************************** GLOBAL/PUBLIC MACRO DEFINITIONS *********************************/
00187 
00188 #ifdef  DEBUG
00189 /*******************************************************************************
00190 * @brief                The CHECK_PARAM macro is used for function's parameters check.
00191 *                               It is used only if the library is compiled in DEBUG mode.
00192 * @param[in]    expr - If expr is false, it calls check_failed() function
00193 *                       which reports the name of the source file and the source
00194 *                       line number of the call that failed.
00195 *                    - If expr is true, it returns no value.
00196 * @return               None
00197 *******************************************************************************/
00198 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr) ((expr) ? (void)0 : check_failed((uint8_t *)__FILE__, __LINE__))
00199 #else
00200 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr)
00201 #endif /* DEBUG */
00202 
00203 
00204 
00205 /************************** GLOBAL/PUBLIC FUNCTION DECLARATION *********************************/
00206 
00207 #ifdef  DEBUG
00208 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line);
00209 #endif
00210 
00211 
00212 #endif /* LPC17XX_LIBCFG_H_ */
